data.title: National Housing Authority
data.text:
The National Housing Authority (NHA), headed by General Manager Joeben Tai, marked the celebration of National Indigenous Peoples (IP) Day by reaffirming its commitment to improving the lives of IPs nationwide, highlighting its efforts in providing culturally sensitive shelter to various ethnic groups. To date, under its Housing Assistance Program for Indigenous Peoples (HAPIP), the continue reading : NHA MARKS NATIONAL IP DAY; EMPOWERS ETHNIC GROUPS

The National Housing Authority (NHA) distributed 20 housing units to Super Typhoon Yolanda-victim families during the conduct of the Bagong Pilipinas Serbisyo Fair (BPSF) held at the Eastern Visayas State University in Tacloban City, Leyte, on August 2, 2024. Under the guidance of NHA General Manager Joeben A. Tai, NHA Region 8 Manager Engr. Constancio continue reading : NHA AWARDS HOUSES TO YOLANDA-VICTIM FAMILIES; DISTRIBUTES EHAP IN CEBU & CAVITE

Following the onslaught of Typhoon Carina and the Southwest Monsoon (Habagat), the National Housing Authority (NHA) led by General Manager Joeben Tai, will implement a month-long moratorium on housing amortization and lease payments for affected NHA housing beneficiaries from the National Capital Region (NCR), Regions III and IV. Based on the NHA Memorandum Circular No. continue reading : NHA GRANTS MORATORIUM TO CARINA-STRICKEN HOUSING BENEFICIARIES

The National Housing Authority (NHA) recently distributed a total of 233 homes to qualified beneficiaries in Tagum City, Davao del Norte and in the municipality of Glan, Saranggani Province. Through the leadership of NHA General Manager Joeben A. Tai, two hundred (200) families received housing units from the NHAâ€™s Masandag Tribal Village Phase 1 and continue reading : NHA DISTRIBUTES MORE THAN 200 HOMES IN MINDANAO
